medical_history.chief_complaint: Ototoxicity possibly associated with the use of NRTIs in patients with HIV-1 infection.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patients developed tinnitus and deterioration in hearing associated with antiretroviral therapy. Tinnitus began in one patient as early as 1991, with hearing difficulties noted in 1993 and further declines observed in subsequent audiology tests. Symptoms worsened over time with documented progression of hearing loss in multiple assessments.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of high-frequency hearing loss due to occupational noise exposure; no history of opportunistic infections.
medical_history.social_history: History of military service with exposure to machine-gun fire; retired from occupation with noise exposure.
